title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 609.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 609.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the commission's rules and regulations
which apply to the provision of basic local exchange service by telephone
corporations when service is provided to residential customers or applicants
for residential service as defined in section
609.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
609.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
